texts.name: Jules
texts.biography: Jules had always wanted to fly. Other Minotaurs called him crazy. Who's crazy now?
Even before the reactivation of the Heavenly Forge, Jules had always yearned to traverse the skies. Other Minotaurs called him crazy. Who's crazy now?
